title: Let's see how many fucked up things most of society thinks we can list off.
body:
Woman hitting man = fine
Man hitting woman = batshit crazy

Heterosexuals passionately kissing = fine
Homosexuals passionately kissing = KIDS, CLOSE YOUR EYES, NOW

%%%%%%%%% = Child molester

(No, the two are not the same, a %%%%%%%%% is a person sexually attracted to children, a child molester is a person who has molested a child, yet society thinks of them as the same which does not contribute at all in a positive way to a large issue of %%%%philia and how to deal with it as it is a mental condition).

Homeschooling = not as good as public school and creates an antisocial child

(Yes, homeschooling can create an antisocial child, but that's only if the environment itself is antisocial which can be avoided, and many studies have proven homeschoolers to have a higher everything in school than public schoolers, doesn't mean public school is bad though)

The people on the front covers of magazines are what you should be aiming to look for.

(Those people have been photoshopped to death and it's an impossible look to achieve, there's no point in trying to look that way because it isn't real).

People who have a larger body frame than usual are fat.

A man claims he has been raped = a joke, laugh

A woman claims she has been raped = serious issue, fix


Anything else you guys would like to add?

Society has its positives, but personally, I find the negatives to stand out more. :)
